conbody.p: As a supervisor, you can use the application for managing the work orders in the .

Using the application, you can:
Access the work orders whose statuses are In Progress, Ready, On Hold, and Completed.
Prioritize a work order on a Production Line.
Access the work order status.
Access the work order history.
Access the clocked on and clocked off operations.
Access the NCM defects.

section.title: Work Order Components
section.p: Each row in the page represents a work order and displays the work orders of the selected Line.

A work order contains the following components:
Work Order
Operation
Lot or Serial Number
